Package org.apache.activemq.artemis.core.server.cluster.ha

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    HAManager  
    HAPolicy<T extends Activation>
    Every live server will have an HAPolicy that configures the type of server that it should be either live, backup or colocated (both).
